resources.string:
Emergency number: 999

 Calling code: +44 

 Currency: Pound sterling (GBP), symbol Â£ 

 Driving: on the left side of the road

 Electrical outlets: 230V, BS 1363 plug. If
 required, adapters can be purchased from
 the airport, or cheaper from almost any
 shop in the city.

 Climate: oceanic/temperate. Winters are
 mild and summers are usually rainy.
